Package com.cmput301w19t12.bookbuddies

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    BrowseFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    This interface must be implemented by activities that contain this fragment to allow an interaction in this fragment to be communicated to the activity and potentially other fragments contained in that activity.
    ClubFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    This interface must be implemented by activities that contain this fragment to allow an interaction in this fragment to be communicated to the activity and potentially other fragments contained in that activity.
    MyLibraryFragment.OnFragmentInteractionListener
    This interface must be implemented by activities that contain this fragment to allow an interaction in this fragment to be communicated to the activity and potentially other fragments contained in that activity.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddClubActivity
    Activity which allows the user to create a new book reading club.
    Book
    Book represents a book object A book has book details, an owner, and a borrow status
    BookAndBookDetailsTest  
    BookBuddies
    This class serves to initialize firebase
    BookDetails
    Represents the details of an associated book A set of book details contains a title, author, picture path, description and genre
    BookDetailsActivity
    Allows the user to view the details of a given book details are presented in a series of EditText views
    BookRequest
    Represents a book request event contains requesterID and username, the requested book and the request ID
    BookRequestNotificationAdapter
    BookRequestNotificationAdapter creates views for entries in an array of BookRequestNotifications
    BookRequestTest  
    BookTransactionActivity
    Handles the event of a book being passed from one user to the other, either in the event of an initial borrowing, or the return of previously borrowed book.
    BrowseFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    Chat
    Chat class represents a chat object between two or more users A chat has a list of messages and users
    ChatMessageAdapter  
    Club
    Club class represents a club object A Club contains an owner, has a name, a list of members, a book the members are currently reading, and a list of club related events
    ClubChatActivity
    ClubChatActivity allows the user to chat with other users in real time in a forum style format where the newest posts are placed at the top of the window
    ClubDetailsActivity
    Presents the user with all the details of a given club
    ClubFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    ClubTest  
    CreateAccountActivity  
    DetailedBookList
    Displays a detailed book list which includes the title, status, and descriptions of all the books that the user owns.
    EditBookDetailsActivity  
    ExampleUnitTest
    Example local unit test, which will execute on the development machine (host).
    ExpandingMenuListAdapter
    An Expanding List Adapter which inherits from BaseExpandableListAdapter placing the headers as the groupview and each of the titles as a childview within the group.
    LivePreviewActivity
    Demo app showing the various features of ML Kit for Firebase.
    LogInActivity  
    LoginValidator
    LoginValidator object checks and tracks the validity of login info LoginValidator has a bool validLogin, usernameField, emailField and passwordField
    MainActivity  
    MainActivity.PlaceholderFragment
    A placeholder fragment containing a simple view.
    MapsActivity  
    Message
    Message class represents a single message in a chat sequence A message contains text, time sent, and the sender of the message
    MessageChatTest  
    MyAppGlideModule
    Glide module used to simplify image retrieval from firebase storage
    MyBorrowingBooksActivity
    Shows the user a list of books they are currently borrowing
    MyBorrowingBooksAdapter  
    MyLatLng
    User made LatLng class to temporarily replace built in LatLng class as it has no empty constructor and cannot be used to store locations in firebase as it will crash on retrieval
    MyLatLngTest  
    MyLibraryFragment
    A simple Fragment subclass.
    MyProfileActivity
    Presents the user with their profile information
    MyRequestsActivity
    Shows the user a list of the books they currently have request on
    NewBookActivity
    NewBookActivity allows user to create a new book in the database and add a picture to the book
    PendingTransactionsActivity
    Presents the user with a list of pending transactions attached to their account
    PendingTransactionsAdapter
    creates views from an array of transactions
    RequestTest  
    RequestViewActivity
    Allows the user to see all the pending requests on a particular book
    RequestViewAdapter
    RequestViewAdapter functions to create a list of requests on the users books that they can either accept of decline
    SearchResultAdapter
    generates search result views given a string array
    SearchResultsActivity
    Search Results activity gets the final query string inputted by the user, and presents all matching results in a listView
    SectionsPageAdapter
    Sets up the fragment interface with 3 tabs which include clubs tab, browse tab, and the mylibrary tab
    Transaction
    Transaction class represents a book transaction between two users A book transaction has an owner, borrower, location, book and time
    TransactionTest  
    User
    User class represents a user account within the app A user has a username, password, phone number, email address and profile picture path
    UserTest  
    VisionProcessorBase<T>
    Abstract base class for ML Kit frame processors.
